donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: This output is linked with Trade and Private Sector 00055103 output 2 (GSB - CPI).  The Youth Employment Joint Program funds will be disbursed from this output in 2011.  The project aims at supporting the intitiatives of young entrepreneurs through the inclusive businesses and market approaches in order to link with larger companies as their preferential markets. The project will provide training to the youth to improve their management and technical skills so that they can meet the market requirements in terms of quality and standards and promote the linkages through brokerage services.
